page.title: 04CHILDREN TALKING - LIFESTYLE
page.content: A survey among 8-9 year olds of both sexes provided information. Most enjoyed school and P.E. was by far the most popular lesson. Bedtimes were 8.00pm or later and few enjoyed bedtime. Most children had pocket money. Milk and Coco Cola were favourite drinks. Fish, chips, sausages, egg, bacon and salad were popular foods. All children loved chocolate. Football and swimming were popular sports and children generally enjoyed energetic games. Cars and dolls were popular toys and 'Tom and Jerry'favourite cartoon characters. Children enjoyed going out and visiting family and friends. Few children wear glasses and most children are able to swim unaided. Most enjoy quiet hobbies as well as the other energetic sports. Television was popular and likewise videos.
